title: The Rylands papyrus gives a total amount of poll tax for the village of six talents, 2,312 drachmae or 38,312 drachmae and, since the poll tax was levied in the Arsinoite at 40 drachmae, this suggests 957.8 poll tax payers. estimates from the tax rolls that the number of poll tax payers in 171–4 was 575–644. Poll tax was levied on all male Egyptians over 14 but Roman and Alexandrian citizens, women and children were exempted.
